text: H: Notice of intent to veto (Gov. Msg. No. 1301)
S: Notice of Intent to veto dated 06/06/2025 (Gov. Msg. No. 1301)
H: Transmitted to Governor.
S: Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 821).
H: Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 888).
H: Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Amato, Belatti, Iwamoto, Perruso, Tam voting no (5) and Representative(s) Cochran excused (1).
S: Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1).  Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none.  Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Awa).  Excused, 1 (Senator(s) McKelvey).
S: 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-25
S: Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 255).
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Wednesday, 04-30-25.
H: Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 255) as amended in (CD 1).

H: The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Takayama, Matayoshi, Tarnas, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Chun, Alcos; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

S: The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) San Buenaventura, Keohokalole, Moriwaki, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard.
S: Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-25-25 5:20 PM; Conference Room 329.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday 04-25-25 3:15PM in conference room 329.
H: Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Thursday, 04-24-25 3:16PM in conference room 329.
H: Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 826).
S: Received notice of change in conferees (Hse. Com. No. 756).
S: Senate Conferees Appointed: San Buenaventura Chair; Keohokalole, Gabbard, Moriwaki Co-Chairs; Fevella.
H: House Conferees Changed: Representative Matayoshi added as Co-Chair. Representative Chun discharged as Co-Chair; Added as Member.
S: Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 732).
H: House Conferees Appointed: Takayama, Chun, Tarnas, Keohokapu-Lee Loy Co-Chairs; Alcos.
H: Re-referred to HLT, CPC, JHA, FIN, referral sheet 31
S: Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 704).
H: House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
H: Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No.  615) in amended form (SD 2).
S: Report Adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).  Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none.  Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Awa).  Excused, 0 (none).  Transmitted to House.
S: 48 Hrs. Notice 04-08-25.
S: Reported from JDC/WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1816) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).

S: The committee(s) on  WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 12 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Lee, C., Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) DeCoite.

S: The committee(s) on  JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in JDC were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Gabbard, Chang, San Buenaventura; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Awa; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee on JDC/WAM has added the measure to decision making scheduled on 04-01-25 10:00AM; CR 211 & Videoconference.
S: Re-Referred to HHS/CPN, JDC/WAM.
S: Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDC.
S: Reported from HHS/CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1329) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDC.

S: The committee(s) on  CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in CPN were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keohokalole, Fukunaga, McKelvey; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Awa; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Richards.

S: The committee(s) on  HHS recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in HHS were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) San Buenaventura, Aquino, Hashimoto, Keohokalole; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.
S: The committee(s) on HHS/CPN has rescheduled its public hearing to 03-19-25 9:30AM; CR 229 & Videoconference.
S: The committee(s) on HHS/CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 03-19-25 8:30AM; Conference Room 229 & Videoconference.
S: Referred to HHS/CPN, JDC.
S: Passed First Reading.
S: Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 208).
H: Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Pierick, Ward excused (2).  Transmitted to Senate.
H: Reported from JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1079), recommending passage on Third Reading.

H: The committee on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Tarnas, Poepoe, Belatti, Hashem, Kahaloa, Perruso, Takayama, Todd, Garcia, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran.
H: Bill scheduled for decision making on Thursday, 02-27-25 2:00PM in conference room 325 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: The committee(s) on JHA recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 02-27-25.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by JHA on Tuesday, 02-25-25 2:00PM in House conference room 325 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on JHA as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Ward excused (2).
H: Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 428) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to JHA.

H: The committee on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Matayoshi, Chun, Ilagan, Ichiyama, Kong, Lowen, Marten, Tam, Pierick; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Iwamoto;  Noes: none; and  Excused: none.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Thursday, 02-06-25 2:00PM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Ward excused (2).
H: Reported from HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 33) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.

H: The committee on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Takayama, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Amato, Chun, Marten, Olds, Takenouchi, Alcos, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and  Excused: none.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by HLT on Wednesday, 01-29-25 10:00AM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Referred to HLT, CPC, JHA, referral sheet 1
H: Introduced and Pass First Reading.
H: Pending introduction.
